newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Cricket: Injured Healy to return home.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Cricket: Injured Healy to return home.

text.p: Australia wicketkeeper Ian Healy will return home after injuring his hamstring during Australia's two wicket loss to India in Bangalore on Monday, the Australian Cricket Board (ACB) said in a statement on Tuesday.

Healy will be replaced by Western Australia wicketkeeper Adam Gilchrist for the rest of Australia's tour of India, where they are currently playing in a limited-overs series against their hosts and South Africa.

"Healy had badly damaged a hamstring...and team management on tour and chairman of selectors Trevor Hohns in Australia...decided it was in the player's best interests to return home immediately," ACB chief executive Graham Halbish said in the statement.
Gilchrist will leave for India on Wednesday and will arrive in Delhi in time for Australia's next match of the series against South Africa on Friday.
